[Unit Test for Solution 3]
```python
import os
from pathlib import Path

def modify_permissions_test(file_path, permissions):
    path = Path(file_path)
    path.chmod(permissions)
    
    # Verify the permissions have been modified
    stat_result = os.stat(file_path)
    assert stat_result.st_mode & 0o777 == permissions

# Usage example
modify_permissions_test('/path/to/file', 0o777)
```
